scripts.clean: cd ./css && rm -rf prefixed && rm -rf index.css && rm -rf index.css.map && cd .. && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force
scripts.pushdev: npm run clean && git add . && git commit -m 'update' && git push origin dev
scripts.sass: cd ./css && rm -rf prefixed && rm -rf index.css && rm -rf index.css.map && cd .. && sass --watch ./scss/index.scss ./css/index.css --style compressed
